verses.verse: וְהָרָעָ֖ב <WH7458> ve-ha-ra-'Av And the famine כָּבֵ֥ד <WH3515> ka-Ved [was] sore בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> ba-'A-retz. in the land

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> vay-Hi, came כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher which כִּלּוּ֙ <WH3615> kil-Lu had finished לֶאֱכֹ֣ל <WH398> le-'e-Chol eating אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַשֶּׁ֔בֶר <WH7668> hash-She-ver, the corn אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which הֵבִ֖יאוּ <WH935> he-Vi-'u which they had brought out מִמִּצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> mi-mitz-Ra-yim; of Egypt וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said אֲלֵיהֶם֙ <WH413> 'a-lei-Hem about אֲבִיהֶ֔ם <WH1> 'a-vi-Hem, their father שֻׁ֖בוּ <WH7725> Shu-vu unto them Go again שִׁבְרוּ־ <WH7666> shiv-ru- buy לָ֥נוּ La-nu מְעַט־ <WH4592> me-'at- us a little אֹֽכֶל׃ <WH400> 'O-chel. food

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer spake אֵלָ֛יו <WH413> 'e-Lav about יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah And Judah לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> le-Mor; unto him saying הָעֵ֣ד <WH5749> ha-'Ed did solemnly הֵעִד֩ <WH5749> he-'Id protest בָּ֨נוּ Ba-nu הָאִ֤ישׁ <WH376> ha-'Ish The man לֵאמֹר֙ <WH559> le-Mor unto us saying לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- shall not תִרְא֣וּ <WH7200> tir-'U Ye shall not see פָנַ֔י <WH6440> fa-Nai, my face בִּלְתִּ֖י <WH1115> bil-Ti except אֲחִיכֶ֥ם <WH251> 'a-chi-Chem your brother אִתְּכֶֽם׃ <WH854> 'it-te-Chem. for

אִם־ <WH518> 'im- If יֶשְׁךָ֛ <WH3426> yesh-Cha If thou wilt מְשַׁלֵּ֥חַ <WH7971> me-shal-Le-ach send אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אָחִ֖ינוּ <WH251> 'a-Chi-nu our brother אִתָּ֑נוּ <WH854> 'it-Ta-nu; for נֵרְדָ֕ה <WH3381> ne-re-Dah with us we will go down וְנִשְׁבְּרָ֥ה <WH7666> ve-nish-be-Rah and buy לְךָ֖ le-Cha אֹֽכֶל׃ <WH400> 'O-chel. thee food

וְאִם־ <WH518> ve-'im- if אֵינְךָ֥ <WH369> 'ei-ne-Cha not מְשַׁלֵּ֖חַ <WH7971> me-shal-Le-ach But if thou wilt not send לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo we will not נֵרֵ֑ד <WH3381> ne-Red; [him] we will not go down כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for הָאִ֞ישׁ <WH376> ha-'Ish for the man אָמַ֤ר <WH559> 'a-Mar said אֵלֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH413> 'e-Lei-nu about לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- You will not תִרְא֣וּ <WH7200> tir-'U unto us Ye shall not see פָנַ֔י <WH6440> fa-Nai, my face בִּלְתִּ֖י <WH1115> bil-Ti unless אֲחִיכֶ֥ם <WH251> 'a-chi-Chem except your brother אִתְּכֶֽם׃ <WH854> 'it-te-Chem. for

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, And Israel לָמָ֥ה <WH4100> la-Mah Why הֲרֵעֹתֶ֖ם <WH7489> ha-re-'o-Tem Wherefore dealt ye [so] ill לִ֑י Li; לְהַגִּ֣יד <WH5046> le-hag-Gid with me [as] to tell לָאִ֔ישׁ <WH376> la-'Ish, the man הַע֥וֹד <WH5750> ha-'od still לָכֶ֖ם la-Chem אָֽח׃ <WH251> 'Ach. they

וַיֹּאמְר֡וּ <WH559> vai-yo-me-Ru And they said שָׁא֣וֹל <WH7592> sha-'ol asked שָֽׁאַל־ <WH7592> sha-'al- us straitly הָ֠אִישׁ <WH376> Ha-'ish The man לָ֣נוּ La-nu וּלְמֽוֹלַדְתֵּ֜נוּ <WH4138> u-le-mo-lad-Te-nu of our state and of our kindred לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> le-Mor, saying הַע֨וֹד <WH5750> ha-'od still אֲבִיכֶ֥ם <WH1> 'a-vi-Chem [Is] your father חַי֙ <WH2416> chai age הֲיֵ֣שׁ <WH3426> ha-Yesh there are לָכֶ֣ם la-Chem אָ֔ח <WH251> 'Ach, your brother וַנַ֨גֶּד־ <WH5046> va-Nag-ged- bewray ל֔וֹ lo, עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- him according פִּ֖י <WH6310> pi to the tenor הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <WH1697> had-de-va-Rim of these words הָאֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> ha-'El-leh; we הֲיָד֣וֹעַ <WH3045> ha-ya-Do-a' could we certainly נֵדַ֔ע <WH3045> ne-Da', know כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki would יֹאמַ֔ר <WH559> yo-Mar, that he would say הוֹרִ֖ידוּ <WH3381> ho-Ri-du down אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֲחִיכֶֽם׃ <WH251> 'a-chi-Chem. your brother

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוּדָ֜ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah And Judah אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- unto יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El unto Israel אָבִ֗יו <WH1> 'a-Viv, his father שִׁלְחָ֥ה <WH7971> shil-Chah Send הַנַּ֛עַר <WH5288> han-Na-'ar the lad אִתִּ֖י <WH854> 'it-Ti and we וְנָק֣וּמָה <WH6965> ve-na-Ku-mah with me and we will arise וְנֵלֵ֑כָה <WH1980> ve-ne-Le-chah; and go וְנִֽחְיֶה֙ <WH2421> ve-nich-Yeh that we may live וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> ve-Lo and not נָמ֔וּת <WH4191> na-Mut, and not die גַּם־ <WH1571> gam- well אֲנַ֥חְנוּ <WH587> 'a-Nach-nu we גַם־ <WH1571> gam- well אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> 'at-Tah you גַּם־ <WH1571> gam- well טַפֵּֽנוּ׃ <WH2945> tap-Pe-nu. both we and thou [and] also our little ones

אָֽנֹכִי֙ <WH595> 'a-no-Chi myself אֶֽעֶרְבֶ֔נּוּ <WH6148> 'e-'er-Ven-nu, I will be surety מִיָּדִ֖י <WH3027> mi-ya-Di for him of my hand תְּבַקְשֶׁ֑נּוּ <WH1245> te-vak-Shen-nu; shalt thou require אִם־ <WH518> 'im- him not לֹ֨א <WH3808> lo not הֲבִיאֹתִ֤יו <WH935> ha-vi-'o-Tiv I bring אֵלֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH413> 'e-Lei-cha to you וְהִצַּגְתִּ֣יו <WH3322> ve-hitz-tzag-Tiv unto thee and set לְפָנֶ֔יךָ <WH6440> le-fa-Nei-cha, him before thee וְחָטָ֥אתִֽי <WH2398> ve-cha-Ta-ti then let me bear the blame לְךָ֖ le-Cha כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- for הַיָּמִֽים׃ <WH3117> hai-ya-Mim. for ever

כִּ֖י <WH3588> ki surely לוּלֵ֣א <WH3884> lu-Le For except הִתְמַהְמָ֑הְנוּ <WH4102> hit-mah-Ma-he-nu; we had lingered כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- surely עַתָּ֥ה <WH6258> 'at-Tah now שַׁ֖בְנוּ <WH7725> Shav-nu surely now we had returned זֶ֥ה <WH2088> zeh he פַעֲמָֽיִם׃ <WH6471> fa-'a-Ma-yim. this second time

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said אֲלֵהֶ֜ם <WH413> 'a-le-Hem about יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El Israel אֲבִיהֶ֗ם <WH1> 'a-vi-Hem, And their father אִם־ <WH518> 'im- If כֵּ֣ן׀ <WH3651> ken so אֵפוֹא֮ <WH645> 'e-fO unto them If [it must be] so now זֹ֣את <WH2063> zot likewise עֲשׂוּ֒ <WH6213> 'a-Su do קְח֞וּ <WH3947> ke-Chu this take מִזִּמְרַ֤ת <WH2173> miz-zim-Rat of the best fruits הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> ha-'A-retz in the land בִּכְלֵיכֶ֔ם <WH3627> bich-lei-Chem, in your vessels וְהוֹרִ֥ידוּ <WH3381> ve-ho-Ri-du and carry down לָאִ֖ישׁ <WH582> la-'Ish as מִנְחָ֑ה <WH4503> min-Chah; a present מְעַ֤ט <WH4592> me-'At a little צֳרִי֙ <WH6875> tzo-Ri balm וּמְעַ֣ט <WH4592> u-me-'At and a little דְּבַ֔שׁ <WH1706> de-Vash, honey נְכֹ֣את <WH5219> ne-Chot spices וָלֹ֔ט <WH3910> va-Lot, and myrrh בָּטְנִ֖ים <WH992> ba-te-Nim nuts וּשְׁקֵדִֽים׃ <WH8247> u-she-ke-Dim. and almonds

וְכֶ֥סֶף <WH3701> ve-Che-sef money מִשְׁנֶ֖ה <WH4932> mish-Neh double קְח֣וּ <WH3947> ke-Chu And take בְיֶדְכֶ֑ם <WH3027> ve-yed-Chem; in your hand וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַכֶּ֜סֶף <WH3701> hak-Ke-sef and the money הַמּוּשָׁ֨ב <WH7725> ham-mu-Shav that was brought again בְּפִ֤י <WH6310> be-Fi in the mouth אַמְתְּחֹֽתֵיכֶם֙ <WH572> 'am-te-cho-tei-Chem of your sacks תָּשִׁ֣יבוּ <WH7725> ta-Shi-vu carry [it] again בְיֶדְכֶ֔ם <WH3027> ve-yed-Chem, in your hand אוּלַ֥י <WH194> 'u-Lai perhaps מִשְׁגֶּ֖ה <WH4870> mish-Geh peradventure it [was] an oversight הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> Hu. he

וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et אֲחִיכֶ֖ם <WH251> 'a-chi-Chem also your brother קָ֑חוּ <WH3947> Ka-chu; Take וְק֖וּמוּ <WH6965> ve-Ku-mu and arise שׁ֥וּבוּ <WH7725> Shu-vu go again אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הָאִֽישׁ׃ <WH376> ha-'Ish. unto the man

וְאֵ֣ל <WH410> ve-'El And God שַׁדַּ֗י <WH7706> shad-Dai, Almighty יִתֵּ֨ן <WH5414> yit-Ten give לָכֶ֤ם la-Chem רַחֲמִים֙ <WH7356> ra-cha-Mim you mercy לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> lif-Nei before הָאִ֔ישׁ <WH376> ha-'Ish, the man וְשִׁלַּ֥ח <WH7971> ve-shil-Lach that he may send away לָכֶ֛ם la-Chem אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֲחִיכֶ֥ם <WH251> 'a-chi-Chem brother אַחֵ֖ר <WH312> 'a-Cher your other וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et בִּנְיָמִ֑ין <WH1144> bin-ya-Min; and Benjamin וַאֲנִ֕י <WH589> va-'a-Ni I כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher If שָׁכֹ֖לְתִּי <WH7921> sha-Cho-le-ti I be bereaved שָׁכָֽלְתִּי׃ <WH7921> sha-Chal-ti. [of my children] I am bereaved

וַיִּקְח֤וּ <WH3947> vai-yik-Chu took הָֽאֲנָשִׁים֙ <WH376> ha-'a-na-Shim the men אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַמִּנְחָ֣ה <WH4503> ham-min-Chah present הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> haz-Zot, that וּמִשְׁנֶה־ <WH4932> u-mish-neh- double כֶּ֛סֶף <WH3701> Ke-sef money לָקְח֥וּ <WH3947> la-ke-Chu and they took בְיָדָ֖ם <WH3027> ve-ya-Dam in their hand וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et בִּנְיָמִ֑ן <WH1144> bin-ya-Min; and Benjamin וַיָּקֻ֙מוּ֙ <WH6965> vai-ya-Ku-mu and rose up וַיֵּרְד֣וּ <WH3381> vai-ye-re-Du and went down מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim, to Egypt וַיַּֽעַמְד֖וּ <WH5975> vai-ya-'am-Du and stood לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> lif-Nei before יוֹסֵֽף׃ <WH3130> yo-Sef. Joseph

וַיַּ֨רְא <WH7200> vai-Yar saw יוֹסֵ֣ף <WH3130> yo-Sef And when Joseph אִתָּם֮ <WH854> 'it-Tam with אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בִּנְיָמִין֒ <WH1144> bin-ya-Min Benjamin וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> vai-Yo-mer them he said לַֽאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> la-'a-Sher after עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- unto בֵּית֔וֹ <WH1004> bei-To, to the ruler of his house הָבֵ֥א <WH935> ha-Ve Bring אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאֲנָשִׁ֖ים <WH582> ha-'a-na-Shim [these] men הַבָּ֑יְתָה <WH1004> hab-Ba-ye-tah; home וּטְבֹ֤חַ <WH2873> u-te-Vo-ach and slay טֶ֙בַח֙ <WH2874> te-vach an animal וְהָכֵ֔ן <WH3559> ve-ha-Chen, and make ready כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki for אִתִּ֛י <WH854> 'it-Ti are to יֹאכְל֥וּ <WH398> yo-che-Lu shall dine הָאֲנָשִׁ֖ים <WH582> ha-'a-na-Shim for [these] men בַּֽצָּהֳרָֽיִם׃ <WH6672> Batz-tzo-ho-Ra-yim. with me at noon

וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <WH6213> vai-Ya-'as did הָאִ֔ישׁ <WH376> ha-'Ish, And the man כַּֽאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher after אָמַ֣ר <WH559> 'a-Mar bade יוֹסֵ֑ף <WH3130> yo-Sef; as Joseph וַיָּבֵ֥א <WH935> vai-ya-Ve brought הָאִ֛ישׁ <WH376> ha-'Ish and the man אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאֲנָשִׁ֖ים <WH376> ha-'a-na-Shim the men בֵּ֥יתָה <WH1004> Bei-tah house יוֹסֵֽף׃ <WH3130> yo-Sef. into Joseph's

וַיִּֽירְא֣וּ <WH3372> vai-yi-re-'U were afraid הָֽאֲנָשִׁ֗ים <WH376> ha-'a-na-Shim, now the men כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki because הֽוּבְאוּ֮ <WH935> hu-ve-'U because they were brought בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> beit house יוֹסֵף֒ <WH3130> yo-Sef into Joseph's וַיֹּאמְר֗וּ <WH559> vai-yo-me-Ru, and they said עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- against דְּבַ֤ר <WH1697> de-Var Because הַכֶּ֙סֶף֙ <WH3701> hak-Ke-sef of the money הַשָּׁ֤ב <WH7725> hash-Shav that was returned בְּאַמְתְּחֹתֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH572> be-'am-te-cho-Tei-nu in our sacks בַּתְּחִלָּ֔ה <WH8462> bat-te-chil-Lah, at the first time אֲנַ֖חְנוּ <WH587> 'a-Nach-nu we מֽוּבָאִ֑ים <WH935> mu-va-'Im; are we brought in לְהִתְגֹּלֵ֤ל <WH1556> le-hit-go-Lel that he may seek occasion עָלֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-nu against וּלְהִתְנַפֵּ֣ל <WH5307> u-le-hit-nap-Pel against us and fall עָלֵ֔ינוּ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-nu, against וְלָקַ֧חַת <WH3947> ve-la-Ka-chat upon us and take אֹתָ֛נוּ <WH853> 'o-Ta-nu לַעֲבָדִ֖ים <WH5650> la-'a-va-Dim us for bondmen וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et חֲמֹרֵֽינוּ׃ <WH2543> cha-mo-Rei-nu. and our asses

וַֽיִּגְּשׁוּ֙ <WH5066> vai-yig-ge-Shu And they came near אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הָאִ֔ישׁ <WH376> ha-'Ish, to the steward אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> 'a-Sher after עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> beit house יוֹסֵ֑ף <WH3130> yo-Sef; of Joseph's וַיְדַבְּר֥וּ <WH1696> vay-dab-be-Ru and they communed אֵלָ֖יו <WH413> 'e-Lav to him פֶּ֥תַח <WH6607> Pe-tach with him at the door הַבָּֽיִת׃ <WH1004> hab-Ba-yit. of the house

וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ <WH559> vai-yo-me-Ru And said בִּ֣י <WH994> bi O אֲדֹנִ֑י <WH113> 'a-do-Ni; sir יָרֹ֥ד <WH3381> ya-Rod we came indeed יָרַ֛דְנוּ <WH3381> ya-Rad-nu down בַּתְּחִלָּ֖ה <WH8462> bat-te-chil-Lah at the first time לִשְׁבָּר־ <WH7666> lish-bor- to buy אֹֽכֶל׃ <WH400> 'O-chel. food
